name: Relevance
description: The answer directly addresses the question asked and stays on topic.

name: Clarity
description: The response is clear, concise, and easy to understand.

name: Professionalism
description: The answer maintains a professional tone suitable for an HR interview.

name: Depth of Insight
description: The response provides detailed insights or examples that showcase the candidate's qualifications.

name: Positivity
description: The answer is framed positively, even when discussing challenges or weaknesses.

name: Engagement
description: The response invites further discussion and engages the interviewer.

name: Adaptability
description: The answer demonstrates the candidate's ability to adapt their skills and experiences to the role.
